uses_cases.title: Examples of different IoT applications in buildings
uses_cases.subtitle: Discover how our IoT solutions address key challenges in smart buildings.

card1.title: DETECTION OF DOOR OPENING AND CLOSING
card1.li2: Detect intrusions or thefts; on a site, a construction area, or in a building...
card1.li3: Detect the opening or closing of doors, windows, safes, or even cold rooms
card1.li5: Receive alerts in case of abnormal situations
card1.li6: Count the number of state changes
card1.subtitle: Reported data: cable cuts, punctual events, or counting

card2.title: PEOPLE COUNTING IN DEFINED AREAS
card2.li1: Analyze the occupancy rate of an enclosed area (public spaces, rooms, etc.)
card2.li2: Monitor the attendance of a location in real time
card2.li3: Count the occupants of a room (children and adults)
card2.li5: Receive notifications when thresholds are exceeded
card2.subtitle: Reported data: video streams, number of people present

card3.title: INDOOR AIR QUALITY MONITORING
card3.li2: Measure and regulate ambient data according to zones
card3.li3: Have a portfolio of various data
card3.li7: Receive a notification when thresholds are exceeded
card3.subtitle: Reported data: temperature, humidity, CO2, movements, light levels

card4.title: INDOOR EQUIPMENT GEOLOCATION
card4.li1: Geolocate and track equipment (e.g.: hospital, airport, nursing home, construction site, etc.)
card4.li4: Send alerts on zone entry or exit
card4.subtitle: Reported data: location

card5.title: WORKSTATION PRESENCE DETECTION
card5.li3: Utilize the full capacity of a building
card5.li5: Receive notifications in case of threshold exceedance
card5.subtitle: Reported data: presence, temperature, humidity, brightness

card6.title: FACILITY MANAGEMENT
card6.li1: View passage times, delays, no-shows, and obtain proof of presence
card6.li5: Record staff attendance with the possibility of badge scanning
card6.li6: Collect, with some delay, the requests made on the object
card6.subtitle: Reported data: events
